azurerm_mariadb_configuration.description: Sets a MariaDB Configuration value on a MariaDB Server.

name.description: Specifies the name of the MariaDB Configuration, which needs [to be a valid MariaDB configuration name](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/server-system-variables/). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

server_name.description: Specifies the name of the MariaDB Server. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the MariaDB Server exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

value.description: Specifies the value of the MariaDB Configuration. See the MariaDB documentation for valid values.

id.description: The ID of the MariaDB Configuration.

create.description: Used when creating the MariaDB Configuration.

update.description: Used when updating the MariaDB Configuration.

read.description: Used when retrieving the MariaDB Configuration.

delete.description: Used when deleting the MariaDB Configuration.
